video_prompt: **Prompt:** Anime young woman's lavender hair flows and sways. Her soft purple eyes shift attention. Tassels on her ears and skirt subtly swing. Her movements express a range of emotions as she moves.
image_prompt: Anime girl, lavender hair with cat ear buns, soft purple eyes, attentive gaze. Wearing a cropped white top with magenta emblem, dark indigo and purple Chinese-style jacket with frog closures and wide sleeves. Light blue tassel earrings and skirt trim, multi-layered skirt (black pleated over purple/pink), black shorts, black fingerless gloves with blue accents, and knee-high black combat boots with straps. Dominant colors are purple, blue, black, white, with pink and magenta. Stark white background.
refined_video_prompt: Lavender hair dynamically flows, continuously shifting and swaying. Soft purple eyes actively dart and focus, their gaze altering attention. Tassels on her ears and skirt subtly swing and ripple with her body shifts. Her entire posture and facial expressions fluidly transition, revealing an evolving range of emotions through hesitant gestures, a quickening gaze, and a changing overall demeanor.
